Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2007 11:57AM Marlee wrote: I had IDC; no trace in my lymph nodes and I opted for a mascetomy.  This was the second time I had calcification spots; the first time it was clean; this time, I wasn't as lucky.  I believe I made the right choice - nip it in the bud right up front.  No radiation, no chemo.  I also opted for immediate reconstruction to minimize the number of surgeries.  best decision I made.  I'm at 8 weeks and doing fine.  I exercise a lot (walk 5 miles a day) and that keeps me mentally fit as well.  You need to do what you feel is right.
